solution_line_template: A box of {total_bars} bars was shared equally between {num_people_sharing} people so each person got {total_bars}/{num_people_sharing} = <<{total_bars}/{num_people_sharing}={bars_per_person}>>{bars_per_person} bars
Mike and Rita together got {bars_per_person}+{bars_per_person} = <<{bars_per_person}+{bars_per_person}={combined_bars}>>{combined_bars} bars
